message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

In an income statement, this is represented by "Depreciation" which shows how much of an asset's value has been expensed in the period.

Looking at the income statement provided:
- The line item "Depreciation" has a value of 91503.27 for the date 2024-02-05

This is the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of assets over their useful lives for the given period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91503.27'} }
```
